description: The file defines the EventDeliveryPool class, responsible for managing a shared thread pool that schedules event notification tasks to listeners. It includes methods for retrieving the singleton instance, scheduling notifications for JavaEvent objects, and internal handler classes for executing notification tasks in separate threads.

classes.name: EventDeliveryPool
classes.description: A singleton class that manages a thread pool used for asynchronous event delivery to listeners. It provides methods to get the shared instance and to schedule event notifications.

methods.name: getSharedInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of the EventDeliveryPool.

methods.name: scheduleNotification
methods.description: Schedules a JavaEvent notification to listeners via a thread pool.
